REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Bully
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME spent most of HIS childhood stealing other kids' lunch money.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Farm kid
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up on a farm. HECAP played with sticks and had many pets. Life on the farm wasn't always fun and games for HIM however, HE had to learn how to carry HIS own weight and perform a wide variety of necessary tasks.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Fat kid
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was always picked last in gym, which made HIM sad. NAME ate because HE was sad and HE was sad because HE ate.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mascot
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: High school was rough, especially in the team's unvented mascot costume. Not only did NAME spend the majority of HIS high school days in the hot stuffy suit, but HE got used to it! Being the mascot came with its perks but plenty of downsides. Due to being the school mascot HE was ridiculed and became a social outcast. HECAP also became more than a bit abrasive towards new people.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Medieval witch
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME became interested in alchemy when HE was 5 years old. By the time HE was 9 HE had already created a cure for cancer. However, the church deemed HIS work witch craft, sentencing HIM to be frozen in ice so that HIS spirit may never see redemption.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Military cadet
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a cadet in the Colonial College of Military Warfare from the age of 16. Following in HIS family's tradition, HE studied and sucessfully completed HIS training, picking up a few key skills on the way.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Miner kid
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up with two miners for parents. HECAP listened to them speak to their friends about all the wonderous things they saw deep in the bowels of the planet. HECAP spent HIS entire life learning and dreaming about becoming a miner and exploring all kinds of caverns.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Officer cadet
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a cadet in the Colonial Officer Training College from the age of 16. Having completed sucessfully HE picked up a few key skills and learned how to lead and combat threats from a strategical and tactical point of view.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Pet sitter
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME loved animals and spent a good amount of HIS time looking after other people's pets. They always seemed to like HIM.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Runaway
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME decided at a early age HE did not want to be where HE was so HE took off and never looked back.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Sandbox architect
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME spent all of HIS time as a child playing in the sandbox. While children would pile up a mound of sand in the center of the box and call it a castle and then immediately destroy it, NAME designed and built beautiful castles with courtyards and walls with crenellations punctuated by towers. HECAP often got into fist fights with the children when they tried to destroy HIS work.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Super hero
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was your typical super hero who went around saving cats in distress and helping old ladies cross the street. HECAP always lost HIS lunch money to the villain though.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Tester
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME has always been interested in testing things. Ever since HE was young, HE has been fiddling with and testing things.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Vatgrown engineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was vat-grown as an engineer in an illegal urbworld laboratory. As a young child, HE was taught to tinker, build, and research. For most of HIS childhood, HE knew nothing else.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Vatgrown slave
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was vat-grown as a slave in an illegal urbworld laboratory. As a young child, HE was taught only to cook, clean, and serve HIS masters. For most of HIS childhood, HE knew nothing else.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Young cancer survivor
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Sad truth is even kids get cancer. NAME was one of the unlucky children afflicted. Preventing HIM from interacting much with other children HE spent most of HIS time working on arts and crafts.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Young reader
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME always liked to read books... as many as HE could find... a whole lot many books. But HE didn't have many friends, because HE didn't have time for them.
